audio.description: The path to the audio file being animated

timestamps.description: The path to the file containing pose timestamps

text.description: The path to the script of the audio file

dimensions.description: The resolution of the final video. Passed in the form, "1920:1080"

no_docker.description: Don't start the docker container automatically

codec.description: The video codec used for the VideoWriter

container_name.description: The name of the gentle container

image_name.description: The name of the gentle docker image

vosk_model.description: The path to the Vosk model (obtainable from https://alphacephei.com/vosk/models)

default_pose.description: The pose to use when no pose is specified

aligning_algorithm.description: The algorithm used to extraact the phonemes from the audio (gentle | allosaurus)

transcriber.description: The service used to transcribe audio. Only Vosk is compatable with allosaurus alignment.(vosk | watson)

watson_api_key.description: IBM Watson API key if using Watson for speech-to-text
